overview: Tanya Thomas has more than ten years experience in SEO, Internet Marketing and lead generation services. With several hundred projects to her credit ranging from startups to enterprise level clients, she maintains an active hands-on approach with all campaigns she plans and implements. Even with her extensive experience she continues to offer services at a far more affordable price point than most others with similar work histories. See her online profile at eLance and oDesk.

image.attribution: Tanya Thomas/at oDesk.com
